src:
【騙贏貴婦奈奈7】賣頂級禮盒兼送黑錢　天龍國知名水果行竟是白手套
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by 顏凡裴, 賴智揚
潤寅楊文虎及王音之夫婦，為了能夠成功騙過銀行，找上和他們長期生意往來的8大公司高層或窗口，讓對方配合向銀行虛應照會，營造潤寅應收帳款豐厚的假象，以詐貸百億元。



為了要業者配合，楊文虎夫妻不惜花重金行賄，還找來知名水果店「百纖果屋」老闆蕭炯桂當白手套，花了上千萬元訂購進口高檔水果，送給涉案的8家公司高階主管，還在水果禮盒裡塞大量現鈔，有時太緊急還會請蕭炯桂先墊放，事後再返還，其中，前福懋副總黃明堂就收了近千萬元賄款。


福懋興業管理總部前副總黃明堂，面對檢調質疑協助潤寅詐貸，皆裝傻回應：「不知道」。（聯合知識庫）

本刊調查，百纖果屋以專營進口日本麝香葡萄、哈密瓜、水蜜桃、白草莓及紐西蘭櫻桃等外國水果聞名，每盒售價都是從千元起跳，更高檔的甚至破萬元，是不少政商名流指定購買的精緻水果。
楊文虎夫妻為了不讓詐貸犯行露餡，索性吸收水果行老闆蕭炯桂充當白手套，直接把整捆千元現鈔夾藏在水果禮盒中，利用送禮名義行賄配合廠商。
檢調在這對夫妻潛逃出境後，從女兒楊宇晨的手機，發現不少疑似串通水果行老闆協助滅證的訊息，如「要什麼電話，阿桂（指水果行老闆蕭炯桂）幾乎都有」「明天去阿桂那看看」，再加上蕭炯桂的帳戶有一筆可疑的200萬元資金，也被檢調懷疑是楊文虎善後處理的費用，因此將蕭炯桂羈押禁見。
更新時間｜2019.11.05 14:24
text:
[Cheat to win the lady Nana 7] sell top gift box and send black money Tianlongguo famous fruit line is actually white gloves
05 Nov 2019, 21:58 by Yan Fanzhen, Lai Zhiyang
Runyan Yang Wenhu and Wang Yinzhi couples, in order to successfully deceive the bank, find the top 8 companies or windows of their long-term business dealings with each other, let the other party cooperate with the bank to take care of the bank, and create the illusion of the rich accounts receivable. To swindle billions of dollars.



In order to cooperate with the industry, Yang Wenhu and his wife spared no expense to pay bribes. They also found Xiao Qigui, the owner of the famous fruit shop “Baixian Fruit House”, who spent 10 million yuan to order imported high-grade fruit and gave it to the senior executives of the 8 companies involved. In the fruit gift box, a large amount of cash is also stuffed. Sometimes it is too urgent to ask Xiao Yugui to put it first, and then return it later. Among them, former vice president Huang Mingtang received nearly 10 million yuan in bribes.


Huang Mingtang, former deputy general manager of the Fushun Industrial Management Headquarters, responded to the prosecution and assisted in the management of the scams. They all responded with a stupid response: "I don't know." (Joint Knowledge Base)

According to our survey, Baixianguowu is famous for importing foreign fruits such as Japanese Muscat, Cantaloupe, Peach, White Strawberry and New Zealand Cherry. The price of each box is from 1,000 yuan, even higher or even more than 10,000 yuan. It is a fine fruit that many political and business celebrities have specified to purchase.
In order to prevent the swindlers from showing up, Yang Wenhu and his wife simply took the fruit bank owner Xiao Yugui as a white glove and directly put the whole bundle of thousands of yuan in the fruit gift box and used the gift to pay bribes to the manufacturer.
After the couple fled the country, they found out from the mobile phone of their daughter Yang Yuchen that many suspected collusion with the fruit bank owner helped to extinguish the test. For example, "What is the phone call, Agui (referring to the fruit bank owner Xiao Yugui) almost all" I will go to Aguina tomorrow to see it." In addition, Xiao Yugui’s account has a suspicious amount of 2 million yuan. It was also suspected that Yang Wenhu’s expenses were handled. Therefore, Xiao Yugui was imprisoned.
Update time|2019.11.05 14:24
